title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Develop a clear definition of project objectives, functional requirements, and non-functional requirements for SmartZoning.

title: Design AI Algorithms for Dynamic Zoning
description: Research and design AI algorithms that can analyze urban needs and environmental factors to dynamically adjust land use.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Create an intuitive interface for city planners and urban developers to interact with the SmartZoning system.
dependencies: Design AI Algorithms for Dynamic Zoning

title: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
description: Develop the necessary backend services to process real-time data from urban sensors and environments.
dependencies: Design AI Algorithms for Dynamic Zoning

title: Establish Database Schema and Integration Strategy
description: Design a database schema that efficiently stores and retrieves data related to urban needs, environmental factors, and land use.
dependencies: Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Configure DevOps and Deployment Pipeline
description: Set up the necessary DevOps tools and pipeline for continuous integration, testing, and deployment of SmartZoning.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing
description: Ensure that the SmartZoning system meets all functional and non-functional requirements through rigorous testing.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Perform Security Audit and Implement Measures
description: Conduct a security audit on the SmartZoning system to identify potential vulnerabilities and implement necessary measures.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing

title: Document the SmartZoning System
description: Create comprehensive documentation on the SmartZoning system, including its design, implementation, and usage.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Services for Data Processing
